title: Todd Chrisley Fills In For Lunchbox + Bobby's Concert For A Listener + Amber Pike From "Love Is Blind" Netflix Series
itunes:title: Todd Chrisley Fills In For Lunchbox + Bobby's Concert For A Listener + Amber Pike From "Love Is Blind" Netflix Series
description:
Todd Chrisley stops by the studio to fill in for Lunchbox and co-host the show. He talks about his start in reality television, his family life and even opens up about recent allegations in the news. Bobby plans something awesome for a listener who went to a Raging Idiots concert on the wrong day. Plus, we talk to Amber Pike from the "Love Is Blind" series on Netflix. She shares some behind the scenes moments from the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
